mapper.select: WITH date_range AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(dates.date_value, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS create_time FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1) AS date_value FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 ) dates ) SELECT dr.create_time, NVL(alarm_stats.switch_action, 0) AS switch_action, NVL(alarm_stats.fault_alarm, 0) AS fault_alarm, NVL(alarm_stats.communication_exception, 0) AS communication_exception FROM date_range dr LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS create_time, MAX(CASE WHEN device_type = '主站指令' THEN cnt ELSE 0 END) AS switch_action, MAX(CASE WHEN device_type = '故障报警' THEN cnt ELSE 0 END) AS fault_alarm, MAX(CASE WHEN device_type = '通信异常' THEN cnt ELSE 0 END) AS communication_exception FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(create_time) AS create_time, device_type, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ftu_warn_info WHERE create_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND device_id = #{ftuId} GROUP BY TRUNC(create_time), device_type ) subquery GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) alarm_stats ON dr.create_time = alarm_stats.create_time ORDER BY dr.create_time ASC
